name: ByronbonkersMusic
0:
”Alexa, open byron bonkers music”
”Alexa, ask byron bonkers music for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start byron bonkers music”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: byron bonkers music
des: Listen to the latest talks from your spiritual center. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
